This property is only minutes away from a number of friendly restaurants and 5 minutes from several Creole commercial centres.

This resort offers facilities including Internet access, laundry services (charges apply) and a car park.

Continue onto the B2 for another 13.8 km through Palma and Beau Songe to the junction with the A3. Turn left onto the A3 and drive straight on the A3 Black River Road for some 11.6 km till Ruisseau Creole Commercial Centre. Continue for another 800 m, turn right into Colonel Dean Road, drive 800 m and turn left at the police station. The complex is just another 100 m further on.
